content: Drilling stand DD-HD 30-CA ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features Built-in fine feed – making drilling less tiring during sustained operation Angular drilling – easy, stepless adjustment up to 45° Comprehensive range of accessories available – such as vacuum pads, spacers, cross column, jack screws, fastening kits Easy set-up – tool-free quick-connection of drive unit Applications Drilling range up to 300 mm diameter without spacers Drilling range up to 600 mm diameter with spacers Coring at angles of up to 45° Can be fastened by anchor, using the optional vacuum pad or with the jack screw ### TECHNICAL DATA: Fixation mode: Anchor Angular coring: Yes Column extension: Yes Technical Data | Fixation mode | Anchor | Angular coring | Yes | Column extension | Yes | For use with | DD 250-CA | Weight | 47.18 lb | Base plate dimensions (LxW) | 16.1 x 10.7 in | Drill Stand Height | 42.8 in | Extendable diameter capacity | Yes | Additional Accessory Information | Drill stand for DD 200, DD 250, DD 350-CA and DD 500-CA (wide struts version) | Product information | Drill stand for DD 250-CA with docking station for DD AF-CA H autofeed unit. Also works with DD 200, DD 350/500-CA w/o aoutofeed DD-AF CA ### ITEMS- 2159830 - Drilling stand DD-HD 30-CA - Package Size 1 pc
